book.synopsis: A brilliant distillation of the real motivations behind U.S. foreign policy, compiled from talks and interviews completed between 1986 and 1991, with particular attention to Central America.
book.title_long: What Uncle Sam Really Wants (The Real Story Series)
book.dimensions: Height: 7.25 Inches, Length: 4.25 Inches, Weight: 0.25 Pounds, Width: 0.25 Inches
